layman_description: A limit that controls when the vehicle stops tilting during movement.
technical_description: Threshold setting that activates tilt dampening when vehicle tilt angle exceeds this value.
player_impact: Prevents vehicles from tilting too far when driving on slopes or uneven terrain.

layman_description: How much the game reduces vehicle tilting during movement.
technical_description: Strength value that controls the amount of tilt dampening force applied to the vehicle.
player_impact: Lower values mean more dramatic tilting, higher values create a more stable ride.

layman_description: The angle at which a vehicle starts to tip over.
technical_description: Angle setting that determines when tilt stabilization system activates.
player_impact: Lower values make vehicles easier to flip, higher values make them more stable on slopes.

layman_description: The strength that pushes a tilted vehicle back to level ground.
technical_description: Force value applied to right the vehicle when it exceeds tilt thresholds.
player_impact: Stronger values help vehicles recover quickly from being tilted while driving.

layman_description: How much power the game uses to free vehicles stuck on terrain.
technical_description: Force value that automatically unsticks vehicles from clipping into obstacles.
player_impact: Prevents vehicles from becoming permanently lodged in terrain or structures.

layman_description: The steepest uphill slope a vehicle can climb.
technical_description: Maximum angle in degrees that defines the vehicle's climbing capability.
player_impact: Determines which hills a vehicle can drive up without getting stuck.

layman_description: How hard the game pushes a vehicle upward to help it climb hills.
technical_description: Vertical force value applied to assist vehicle climbing and elevation gain.
player_impact: Stronger values help vehicles drive up steeper terrain more reliably.

layman_description: The top speed a vehicle can reach when using turbo boost.
technical_description: Maximum velocity setting when the turbo acceleration mode is active.
player_impact: Turbo mode allows vehicles to travel faster for short bursts during gameplay.

layman_description: How many shots a weapon fires in a single burst.
technical_description: Number of rounds fired in one trigger pull when burst mode is active.
player_impact: More rounds per burst mean greater damage output but faster ammo consumption.

layman_description: Whether an enemy can climb up ladders to reach higher areas.
technical_description: Setting that determines if entity AI can navigate vertical ladder structures.
player_impact: Affects enemy pathfinding, allowing certain creatures to reach players in elevated positions.

layman_description: How far away a weapon can shoot or a feature can work.
technical_description: Maximum range value in blocks or units where the effect remains active.
player_impact: Determines effective range for combat weapons and block interactions.

layman_description: How wide an enemy's field of vision is.
technical_description: Angle in degrees defining the horizontal viewing arc for entity vision detection.
player_impact: Wider angles mean enemies spot players from larger areas around them.

layman_description: The minimum brightness needed for plants to grow faster.
technical_description: Light level threshold for accelerated plant growth rates.
player_impact: Plants need sufficient light to reach their maximum growth speed in the world.

layman_description: The light level needed to keep plants alive and healthy.
technical_description: Minimum ambient light required to maintain plant vitality and prevent decay.
player_impact: Crops and plants in darkness will eventually die without adequate light exposure.

layman_description: The probability that an enemy falls limp when killed.
technical_description: Percentage chance that entity uses ragdoll physics simulation upon death.
player_impact: Higher values make dead bodies react more realistically with physics simulation.

layman_description: How widely bullets spread out from their target.
technical_description: Spread angle value that defines projectile deviation from the aim direction.
player_impact: Higher spread values make weapons less accurate but more useful at close range.

layman_description: Whether a magazine holds only one type of ammunition.
technical_description: Setting that restricts magazine inventory to a single ammo category.
player_impact: Affects how players organize ammunition in their magazine inventory.

layman_description: Whether the player hears a weapon sound inside their own head.
technical_description: Setting that determines if sound plays from the first-person audio perspective.
player_impact: Affects audio immersion when the player wields or fires a weapon.

layman_description: How much a weapon's shots shift vertically when firing.
technical_description: Vertical displacement value applied to projectile trajectories during spread.
player_impact: Can cause weapons to shoot higher or lower than aimed, affecting accuracy.

layman_description: Whether an item can be used while swimming underwater.
technical_description: Setting that allows item activation in submerged game environments.
player_impact: Determines which tools and weapons remain functional during underwater exploration.

layman_description: The name of the vehicle that an item can activate or spawn.
technical_description: Inventory item value linking to a specific vehicle entity definition.
player_impact: Items like keys or ignition items activate different vehicle types for gameplay.

layman_description: How long before a trap or device warns the player it will activate.
technical_description: Delay timer in seconds before an activated trap triggers its main effect.
player_impact: Gives players a moment to react or escape before taking damage from traps.

layman_description: How bright the lights on a vehicle glow.
technical_description: Light intensity value for vehicle headlights and illumination systems.
player_impact: Brighter lights provide better visibility for nighttime driving.

layman_description: How much fuel a vehicle can hold in its tank.
technical_description: Maximum fuel storage value measured in fuel units for vehicle operation.
player_impact: Larger capacity means longer travel distance before refueling is needed.

layman_description: How far a vehicle travels for each unit of fuel consumed.
technical_description: Fuel efficiency ratio measuring distance traveled per fuel unit.
player_impact: Higher efficiency means vehicles can travel further before needing to refuel.

layman_description: The first gear settings that control vehicle acceleration and torque.
technical_description: Gear ratio and force values for primary low-speed acceleration mode.
player_impact: Determines how quickly a vehicle accelerates from a complete stop.

layman_description: The glowing color of a vehicle mod material.
technical_description: Color value in hexadecimal format for emissive material brightness.
player_impact: Customizes the appearance and glow effects of vehicle modification parts.

layman_description: Where on the vehicle a modification attaches and becomes visible.
technical_description: Attachment point path that specifies the location of mounted vehicle mods.
player_impact: Determines which vehicle parts glow or display customizations.

layman_description: The effect that appears when a vehicle is completely destroyed.
technical_description: Visual effect entity spawned when vehicle health reaches zero.
player_impact: Provides visual feedback when vehicles are destroyed during gameplay.

layman_description: The effect that appears when a vehicle takes heavy damage.
technical_description: Visual effect entity displayed when vehicle sustains critical damage levels.
player_impact: Shows players when their vehicle is severely damaged and needs repair.

layman_description: The recipe name for crafting or building a vehicle item.
technical_description: Inventory value linking to the crafting recipe that creates the vehicle.
player_impact: Players must find this recipe to craft a vehicle for use in the world.

layman_description: How much concrete mixture is needed to build or repair this block.
technical_description: Material quantity value required for concrete-based block construction.
player_impact: Determines resource cost for building structures that need concrete.

layman_description: Whether the player must go back to the quest giver to complete a task.
technical_description: Setting that controls if quest completion requires returning to the NPC giver.
player_impact: Some quests can be finished elsewhere, others require returning to quest givers.

layman_description: The sound a vehicle makes when it runs out of fuel and stops.
technical_description: Audio event triggered when vehicle fuel depletes to zero.
player_impact: Alerts players that their vehicle needs refueling.

layman_description: The sound a vehicle makes when turning off the engine.
technical_description: Audio event played when vehicle becomes inactive or turned off by player.
player_impact: Provides audio feedback for vehicle state changes.

layman_description: The sound a vehicle makes when starting its engine.
technical_description: Audio event triggered when vehicle ignition is activated.
player_impact: Alerts players nearby that a vehicle is being started.

layman_description: How much water slows down vertical movement of a vehicle.
technical_description: Hydrodynamic drag coefficient values for underwater vehicle physics.
player_impact: Vehicles move slower and less responsively when driving through water.

layman_description: How much sharper an enemy's smell or detection senses become.
technical_description: Multiplier value that increases entity sensory detection capabilities.
player_impact: Higher values mean enemies detect players from further away.

layman_description: The fifth available target that the AI can aim at or pursue.
technical_description: Designated target slot available for advanced AI pathfinding behaviors.
player_impact: Affects which entities the AI can prioritize during combat encounters.

layman_description: What happens when a block is activated by the player.
technical_description: Event name triggered when block receives an activation action from player input.
player_impact: Determines in-game effects like spawning enemies or changing day/night cycle.

layman_description: The animation setting that plays when a block becomes active.
technical_description: Boolean animation parameter that switches when block activation state changes.
player_impact: Controls visual changes to blocks when they are turned on or off.

layman_description: The visual state a block changes to when activated.
technical_description: Animation state name transitioned to when block becomes active.
player_impact: Blocks change their appearance visually when players activate them.

layman_description: The action signal that starts the activation animation.
technical_description: Animation trigger event sent when block activation action occurs.
player_impact: Controls when and how block animations play during activation.

layman_description: Which visual parts disappear when an item is activated.
technical_description: List of visual elements that become invisible when item activation occurs.
player_impact: Some items change appearance dramatically when they are activated.

layman_description: The type of ammunition this weapon or block uses to fire.
technical_description: Inventory item value that specifies the ammo type for projectile firing.
player_impact: Determines which ammunition types can be loaded into weapons.

layman_description: How much explosion damage an enemy takes in their arms.
technical_description: Multiplier value for explosive damage applied to upper limb body parts.
player_impact: Exploding weapons deal extra damage to enemy arms when they hit.

layman_description: Whether an enemy can grow an oversized head when affected by certain effects.
technical_description: Setting that enables oversized head physics for specific entity mutations.
player_impact: Affects some special enemy variants with unusual appearance effects.

layman_description: How much explosion damage an enemy takes in their torso.
technical_description: Multiplier value for explosive damage applied to body core area.
player_impact: Exploding weapons deal extra damage to enemy chests when they hit.

layman_description: The size of the invisible ball that prevents items from passing through objects.
technical_description: Radius value in units defining the collision boundary of a thrown item.
player_impact: Larger radius makes items bounce off objects from further away.

layman_description: Whether an item disappears from inventory when the player uses it.
technical_description: Setting that determines if item is destroyed upon use or activation.
player_impact: Consumable items must be crafted or found again after use.

layman_description: How long before a weapon or ability can be used again.
technical_description: Timer duration in seconds before a block or entity action becomes available.
player_impact: Longer cooldowns force players to wait between using certain abilities.

layman_description: The label shown for what action the player performs at a crafting station.
technical_description: Menu text identifier for the available crafting action at this block.
player_impact: Players see different action names depending on the crafting station type.

layman_description: The sound that plays when an item finishes being crafted.
technical_description: Audio event triggered upon successful completion of a craft action.
player_impact: Alerts players when their crafted items are ready for collection.

layman_description: The picture shown in menus representing what can be crafted here.
technical_description: Icon image asset identifier for the crafting station menu display.
player_impact: Players recognize what types of items can be crafted at this station.

layman_description: The sound that plays repeatedly while items are being crafted.
technical_description: Audio event looped during ongoing craft action at this block.
player_impact: Feedback sound confirms the crafting process is actively running.

layman_description: How much damage this block takes from a single hit.
technical_description: Damage value subtracted from block health per strike.
player_impact: Higher values mean blocks are faster to destroy and easier to harvest.

layman_description: How much force the explosion from this item creates.
technical_description: Force magnitude value determining explosion radius and push intensity.
player_impact: More powerful explosions launch objects and enemies further away.

layman_description: Whether a block can be knocked down by explosions or impacts.
technical_description: Setting that determines if blocks fall over as physics objects.
player_impact: Some blocks stay upright while others topple when damaged.

layman_description: The sound a weapon or turret makes when it shoots.
technical_description: Audio event triggered when projectile is fired from weapon.
player_impact: Shooting sounds alert nearby enemies to the player's location.

layman_description: How much explosion damage an enemy takes to their head.
technical_description: Multiplier value for explosive damage applied to head body part.
player_impact: Exploding weapons deal extra damage to enemy heads when they hit.

layman_description: Whether fake copies of this block ignore the original block's properties.
technical_description: Setting that prevents imposter blocks from inheriting from originals.
player_impact: Affects how blocks are rendered and optimized in distant areas.

layman_description: Whether this block is a crop or natural vegetation that grows.
technical_description: Setting that applies plant growth mechanics to this block type.
player_impact: Plants grow over time and can be harvested for food or resources.

layman_description: The amount of damage that forces an enemy to kneel down.
technical_description: Health ratio threshold that triggers kneeling animation state.
player_impact: Injured enemies kneel before standing again to continue combat.

layman_description: The amount of damage that knocks an enemy down flat.
technical_description: Health ratio threshold that triggers prone falling animation state.
player_impact: Heavily damaged enemies fall down and take time to recover.

layman_description: The damage amount that makes an enemy crawl on legs only.
technical_description: Health threshold triggering movement mode where entity crawls.
player_impact: Severely injured enemies move slower by crawling instead of walking.

layman_description: How much explosion damage an enemy takes in their legs.
technical_description: Multiplier value for explosive damage applied to lower limbs.
player_impact: Exploding weapons deal extra damage to enemy legs when they hit.

layman_description: How long a weapon's firing animation continues after the shot is fired.
technical_description: Duration timer for animation overshoot phase in attack sequences.
player_impact: Affects how long weapon animations last and when next actions become available.

layman_description: The effect that appears at the barrel when a weapon fires.
technical_description: Visual effect entity spawned at muzzle during projectile launch.
player_impact: Muzzle flash shows players where shots are coming from.

layman_description: The smoke effect that appears at the barrel when firing.
technical_description: Visual effect entity for smoke generation during weapon discharge.
player_impact: Smoke adds atmosphere and shows weapon firing activity to nearby players.

layman_description: How much the sound pitch varies when the weapon fires.
technical_description: Pitch variation range for audio generation on firing events.
player_impact: Varied pitch sounds more realistic than repeating the same tone.

layman_description: The detailed text shown when a player looks at an item.
technical_description: Localization key for inventory item description display in menus.
player_impact: Players learn what items do and their purpose from these descriptions.

layman_description: The name of the item shown in the interaction menu.
technical_description: Localization key for item name display when examining it.
player_impact: Players see what items are called when looking at them.

layman_description: How much light an enemy needs to see the player clearly.
technical_description: Light level minimum for entity vision detection sensitivity.
player_impact: Enemies have harder time spotting players in darkness.

layman_description: How often an idle enemy makes random vocalizations.
technical_description: Time interval in seconds between ambient sound events for entities.
player_impact: More frequent sounds make enemies seem more alive and alert.

layman_description: How far forward the attachment point extends from a sticky item.
technical_description: Length measurement for collision detection on adhesive projectiles.
player_impact: Affects how sticky items attach and stick to surfaces.

layman_description: The size of the attachment zone on sticky items.
technical_description: Radius value defining the collision boundary for adhesion.
player_impact: Larger zones make sticky items easier to attach successfully.

layman_description: How far upward the attachment extends from the sticky item.
technical_description: Vertical offset distance for collision detection on adhesive projectiles.
player_impact: Affects positioning of sticky items when they attach to surfaces.

layman_description: How fast an enemy can move while swimming underwater.
technical_description: Movement velocity multiplier for entities during swimming.
player_impact: Enemies move slower in water, making them easier to avoid.

layman_description: How quickly an enemy moves their arms and legs while swimming.
technical_description: Animation playback speed multiplier for swimming animation sequence.
player_impact: Affects how realistically swimming enemies move through water.

layman_description: The name of the progress counter tracked for this item.
technical_description: Localization key linking to challenge or quest progress tracker.
player_impact: Players see progress toward completing challenges when using items.

layman_description: Whether the player sees an animation when using this item.
technical_description: Setting that controls animation playback when item is activated.
player_impact: Some items animate when used, others activate instantly without visible motion.

layman_description: How far left and right a weapon or turret can rotate.
technical_description: Rotation angle limits in degrees for horizontal aiming capability.
player_impact: Narrow ranges limit where weapons can aim, wider ranges allow full coverage.

layman_description: How much hunger an active vehicle drains from the player per second.
technical_description: Hunger depletion rate per time unit while riding vehicle.
player_impact: Driving vehicles consumes the player's food, requiring regular eating breaks.

layman_description: The effect that appears when a vehicle's lights are turned on.
technical_description: Visual effect entity spawned when vehicle light mode becomes active.
player_impact: Shows players when vehicle lights are illuminated.

layman_description: How much leather material is needed to craft or repair this item.
technical_description: Resource quantity value required for leather-based crafting.
player_impact: Players must gather sufficient leather to craft items using this material.

layman_description: How much plant fiber is needed to make or repair this item.
technical_description: Resource quantity for yucca fiber-based item construction.
player_impact: Players must harvest plant fibers to craft certain items and repairs.

layman_description: How far the vehicle wheels turn when steering left or right.
technical_description: Maximum steering angle in degrees for vehicle wheel rotation.
player_impact: Greater angles allow tighter turns, smaller angles create wider turning radius.

layman_description: How much the vehicle bounces when driving over rough ground.
technical_description: Suspension compression ratio affecting shock absorption on terrain.
player_impact: Higher values create bouncier suspension, lower values ride smoother.

layman_description: The size of the dust clouds created when a vehicle wheel spins.
technical_description: Scale multiplier for dust effect particles generated at wheel contact.
player_impact: Affects how visible the vehicle's movement appears to nearby players.

layman_description: Which materials can be used to improve or enhance this item.
technical_description: Inventory items acceptable as upgrade materials for this item.
player_impact: Players can only use specific materials to upgrade items.

layman_description: How long an enemy waits between attacks during daytime.
technical_description: Cooldown timer for daylight combat attack cycles.
player_impact: Enemies attack less frequently during daytime hours.

layman_description: How long an enemy waits between attacks during nighttime.
technical_description: Cooldown timer for nighttime combat attack cycles.
player_impact: Enemies attack more frequently during nighttime horde events.

layman_description: Whether a player can hold this item in their inventory.
technical_description: Setting that determines if item can be collected and carried.
player_impact: Some items can only be held while others are automatically displayed.

layman_description: What item this becomes after being used or depleted.
technical_description: Transformation value for item state changes upon use.
player_impact: Items transform into different forms after being used by players.

layman_description: The picture shown on the compass when enemies are below the player.
technical_description: Icon image asset for compass display when entity is below.
player_impact: Players see compass indicators showing enemy positions relative to themselves.

layman_description: The picture shown on the compass to represent this enemy type.
technical_description: Icon image asset used for entity representation on compass display.
player_impact: Different enemies appear as different symbols on the compass.

layman_description: The picture shown on the compass when enemies are above the player.
technical_description: Icon image asset for compass display when entity is above.
player_impact: Players see compass indicators showing enemy positions above them.

layman_description: Which recipes can be completed at this particular crafting station.
technical_description: Crafting recipe categories available for this block type.
player_impact: Different crafting stations produce different types of items.

layman_description: Extra damage dealt when hitting earth blocks with this weapon.
technical_description: Damage multiplier bonus applied to earth-type material strikes.
player_impact: Some weapons are more effective at harvesting stone and earth blocks.

layman_description: Extra damage dealt when hitting wooden blocks or structures.
technical_description: Damage multiplier bonus applied to wood-type material strikes.
player_impact: Certain weapons harvest wood more efficiently than others.

layman_description: How much wear and tear an item can take before breaking.
technical_description: Maximum durability value for item degradation tracking system.
player_impact: Items with higher durability last longer before requiring repair or replacement.
